entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:37 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
